description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Marching with Gomez. A war-correspondent's field note-book kept during four months with the Cuban army ... Illustrated by the author. With an historical introduction by J. Fiske" Author: FLINT, Grover. Contributor: Fiske, John Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9771.d.28." Page: 234 Place of Publishing: Boston, U.S.A Date of Publishing: 1898 Publisher: Lamson, Wolffe & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001255062 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
